0.1.name: wordpress/salmon
0.1.description:
This is a very early state of a salmon-plugin for WordPress. There are still some bugs and problems... Please let me know if you found some.

You can find more informations about Salmon here: http://www.salmon-protocol.org/

This plugin requires:

  • the /.well-known/-plugin: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/well-known/
  • the host-meta-plugin: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/host-meta/
  • the webfinger-plugin: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/webfinger/

more doku soon!
